https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/bSe8CBqK8HkbP6sqZWzcJfQV9Ci.jpg While watching two children on Halloween night, a babysitter finds an old VHS tape in the kids' trick or treat bag. The tape features three tales of terror, all linked together by a murderous clown. All Hallows' Eve
